pr_title: Reorder strings to group by usage

timeline.bodyText: Guessing this just isn't relevant anymore?

replies.bodyText: That's right -- that code has changed a lot and we're way past Android 1.6!
replies.author: lognaturel

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/collect_app/src/main/java/org/odk/collect/android/activities/FormEntryActivity.java b/collect_app/src/main/java/org/odk/collect/android/activities/FormEntryActivity.java
index 0b4636dcc..b75b0e1af 100644
--- a/collect_app/src/main/java/org/odk/collect/android/activities/FormEntryActivity.java
+++ b/collect_app/src/main/java/org/odk/collect/android/activities/FormEntryActivity.java

@@ -898,6 +898,14 @@ public class FormEntryActivity extends CollectAbstractActivity implements Animat
             case RequestCodes.AUDIO_CHOOSER:
             case RequestCodes.VIDEO_CHOOSER:
             case RequestCodes.IMAGE_CHOOSER:
+                /*
+                 * We have a saved image somewhere, but we really want it to be in:
+                 * /sdcard/odk/instances/[current instnace]/something.jpg so we move
+                 * it there before inserting it into the content provider. Once the
+                 * android image capture bug gets fixed, (read, we move on from
+                 * Android 1.6) we want to handle images the audio and video
+                 */
+
                 ProgressDialogFragment progressDialog = new ProgressDialogFragment();
                 progressDialog.setMessage(getString(R.string.please_wait));
                 progressDialog.show(getSupportFragmentManager(), ProgressDialogFragment.COLLECT_PROGRESS_DIALOG_TAG);

timeline.message: Use form update frequency string in admin settings
Remove string only used for debug
Remove comment that is no longer relevant
